rows.label: qst300306_msg001
rows.name: 面接２　FEV

rows.label: qst300306_msg002
rows.name: 選択肢１：スペルビア人ですよね？

rows.label: qst300306_msg003
rows.name: 選択肢２：得意なことについて

rows.label: qst300306_msg004
rows.name: 選択肢３：なぜうちの傭兵団にしたの？

rows.label: qst300306_msg005
rows.name:
返答１：・・・・・・そうだ
スペルビア人だと問題があるか？

rows.label: qst300306_msg008
rows.name: さらに詳しく聞く(FS)

rows.label: qst300306_msg009
rows.name: 返答１：続き

rows.label: qst300306_msg010
rows.name: 返答２：続き

rows.label: qst300306_msg011
rows.name: 返答３：続き

rows.label: qst300306_msg0001
rows.name:
My name is Zengrid Catador. I've
shortened it for convenience' sake,
but Zengrid will do just fine.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0002
rows.name:
That is, I mean...
Please, call me Zengrid.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0003
rows.name:
I come from a long line of nobility
originating in Fons Maim, but they
have since fallen from grace.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0004
rows.name:
I know what it is to make ends meet
and am therefore well suited to any
position that involves accounting.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0005
rows.name:
All right then, we'd like to ask you
a few questions.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh yes, we're accepting questions at
the moment. Err...I mean, of course.
Fire away.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0051
rows.name: What should I ask about?

rows.label: qst300306_msg0052
rows.name: His personal motivations

rows.label: qst300306_msg0053
rows.name: His strongest skills

rows.label: qst300306_msg0054
rows.name: Where he sees himself in five years

rows.label: qst300306_msg0055
rows.name: Nothing in particular

rows.label: qst300306_msg0101
rows.name:
I need the money!
...That is, I would quite like to
be financially reimbursed.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0102
rows.name: Any particular reason why?

rows.label: qst300306_msg0103
rows.name:
As you know, my once-noble house
is but a shadow of itself now.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0104
rows.name:
If I am to return it to its former
eminence, I'm going to need capital.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0105
rows.name:
To that end, I will have you hire me!
...I mean, I hope that you will.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0201
rows.name:
I have no home, no fortunes to fall back
on. All I have now is an excessively long
name and a shrewd business sense.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0202
rows.name: Could you go into more detail there?

rows.label: qst300306_msg0203
rows.name:
I had a good upbringing, back when
I was part of the nobility.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0204
rows.name:
And in that time, I learned to discern
true quality from cheap knock-offs.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0205
rows.name:
So I can say with confidence that
I shall be able to find you the best
deals on high grade equipment.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0301
rows.name:
I'm looking to return to my former
glory. I can't be stuck forever with
a servant boy's wages.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0302
rows.name:
And what would you be bringing
to the Merc Group?

rows.label: qst300306_msg0303
rows.name:
I can streamline your resource
management so that you will be able
to operate as efficiently as possible.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0304
rows.name:
In the short while I've been here, I can
already see weapons, food, materials
just lying around, being put to waste.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0305
rows.name:
Your numbers have shot up recently,
which means that you're too busy to
handle every little thing. Am I wrong?

rows.label: qst300306_msg0401
rows.name: All right, we'll finish up there.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0402
rows.name:
We'll announce our decision in a
short while. You can leave now.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0403
rows.name:
If you don't hire me, you'll sorely reg-
...Please excuse me. I can't seem to
kick the old aristocratic hauteur...

rows.label: qst300306_msg0404
rows.name:
Well, that's the last of them. Take
your time mulling it over. Then
gimme a shout.

rows.label: qst300306_msg0501
rows.name: Anything else you want to ask?
